title: How to detect obfuscator (de4dot shows: Detected unknown obfuscator)
content:
Generally, I use de4dot to detect obfuscator or deobfuscate. But some files are protected as they show:

Detected unknown obfuscator

What are ways to detect the obfuscator of .exe?

comments.text: You're asking for ways to do it automatically (i.e., with a software), correct?
@user202729 doenst matter,if there is automatic, it will be better of course, like de4dot
